name: Newer Super Mario Bros. Wii World Map
summary: A KPMAP file is a world map file used by Newer Super Mario Bros. Wii, a fan-made sequel to Nintendo's New Super Mario Bros. Wii. It contains a map used to organize Newer Super Mario Bros. Wii courses. KPMAP files can be opened and edited using the Koopatlas Map Editor.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
